title: Stuck on "Log in Status - Loading..."
body: I have been trying to log in for about six hours now on and off. But every time i come in I'm able to authenticate with no issues but then it get's stuck on the Loading portion of logging into the client. Is there any known solution to this that might help me fix it? Should i just wait until the 7.16 patch release tomorrow and try again? Any help would be appreciated.

replies.body: Just a simple Connection issue that can be stabilized by running through our [Troubleshooting Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664). Make sure to go through each step, no matter how mundane it may seem. If it continues on after that reach back out to me and i'll dive in a bit deeper.
